sentences.en: Come to my suite so I can tell you all about this wonderful play I saw in Boston.
sentences.cn: 到我的套房来吧，这样我就可以跟你好好讲讲我在波士顿看的这部非常棒的戏了。

sentences.en: Don worked in Boston in the twenties.
sentences.cn: 二十年代唐在波士顿工作.

sentences.en: His taste was for David Bowie , Boston, and Cheap Trick.
In 1932, one Boston layman wrote to Archbishop William O'Connell in support of Father Coughlin.
sentences.cn: 1932年，波士顿一名平信徒致函大主教威廉·奥康奈尔，声援库格林神父。

sentences.en: In a new recording, the Boston Philharmonic tried the original tempo.
sentences.cn: 在新唱片中，波士顿爱乐乐团尝试了全新的节奏。

sentences.en: In March 1770, there occurred what became known as the Boston Massacre.
sentences.cn: 1770年3月在那里发生了后来闻名的波士顿惨案。
波士顿，真是一座伟大的城市。

sentences.en: Mack was driving down from Vermont, with a stop in Boston to pick Sarah up.
sentences.cn: 麦克正开车从佛蒙特向南行驶，中途经停波士顿接上萨拉。

sentences.en: She's on the line from her home in Boston.
sentences.cn: 她是在波士顿家中打电话。

sentences.en: The lady returned from Boston Monday week.
sentences.cn: 这位女士是上上个星期一从波士顿回来的.

sentences.en: The lady returned from Boston Wednesday week.
sentences.cn: 这位女士是上上个星期三从波士顿回来的.

sentences.en: The New England Shelter in Boston will serve Christmas dinner for 200 vets.
sentences.cn: 波士顿的新英格兰收容所将为200名老兵提供圣诞晚餐。

sentences.en: Two rapid transit trains collided early this morning in Boston.
sentences.cn: 今晨早些时候，两辆高速火车在波士顿相撞。

sentences.en: We took the red-eye to Boston.
sentences.cn: 我们乘坐夜间航班飞到波士顿。

trans.tran_cn: 波士顿（美国马萨诸塞州首府）
trans.tran_en: a card game for four, played with two packs
